entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
